review: After changing multiple seasoned doctors in NCR finally we found Dr Divya and the rest is history.From our first consultation we were sure that we found exactly what we were looking for.Dr Divya is  a very competent Dr and she made my motherhood journey so beautiful without any discomfort I delivered my baby.What really makes her standout is that she personally keeps a tab on everything related to the treatment always gives optimum time in the consultation always open to clear your doubts and concerns.If you want an incredible motherhood journey she is the best choice.I couldn't have found a better Dr than her and I express my heartiest gratitude that she made my motherhood journey so enjoyable even after a second c section I was independently able to handle my baby right after 2 days of surgery.Thanks a lot Ma'am for everything that you did for me.

We consulted Doctor Divya Pandey for my wife's pregnancy's. Dr. Divya took the time to explain each step of the process. She always addressed  our queries. She advised us how the whole journey will be, thorough explanation of pregnancy related tests, procedures and options. *** *** ********* ********* ** ******** ***** ***** ************ *** ***************** ***********  We felt reassured and well informed throughout my wife's pregnancy journey. The clinic's warm and welcoming atmosphere to make us feel at ease during prenatal visits.

Thank you Dr Divya for ensuring a smooth and heathy pregnancy for my wife and my baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am writing this review with immense gratitude for the exceptional care and support you provided during the delivery of my newborn. Your expertise, compassion, and dedication made the entire birthing experience a positive and reassuring one.From our first consultation to the delivery room, your professionalism and genuine concern for both me and my baby were evident. Your ability to communicate effectively, answer all our questions, and alleviate any concerns we had truly set us at ease.The personalized care and attention you provided during labor were invaluable. Your calm and reassuring presence made a significant difference, creating a comforting environment for both my family and me. Your commitment to ensuring the well-being of both me and baby is truly commendable.

review: I had a delivery under her care. My experience of having treated by her starting from my first appointment 8 months back till the date of delivery and post delivery as well have been nothing but a wonderful one. She does not recommend/advice for any unnecessary test or appointments or medical prescriptions. Coupled with the above, the consultation fees are on the lower side compared to other clinics. It had been worth all our time and money under her care and treatment. Extremely satisfied and highly recommend to all to be mothers

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
We visited Dr. Divya for the first time in 2022 as my wife was having issues related to PCOS. First time itself the attitude of the doctor was so friendly and helpful that we were amazed. She was so detailed in her explaination of issues and treatment that we became very comfortable. 
After some time we had an unplanned pregnancy and visited Doctor regularly for that. During the pregnancy, my wife was having a lot of issues related to vomiting, pain, etc. once she fell sick due to flu infection (caused by me) and many other issues were there. My wife was vomiting whole 9 months. The pregnancy was very stressful for us, but whenever we used to visit Dr. Divya, she used to motivate and cheer us with her guidance. It was our first pregnancy and we didn’t know much and we were very annoying also. But dr. was very helpful and she guided us very well.
It was to such an extent that she got her empaneled to a hospital at our insistence because we wanted to go for that specific hospital.
We are really indebted for her support during the entire process.
The C-section performed was also very good (as told by her).
Overall the experience was not like a doctor but more like an elder sister.
All I can say is that I’ll always recommend her, either online channels or personally to my friends also.
reply_text: Thanks for giving your time to write such a detailed feedback.

review:
I had the absolute pleasure of consulting Dr. Divya Pandey throughout my entire pregnancy. Her warm and compassionate demeanor put me at ease during each visit, making a normally stressful time in a woman's life much easier to handle. 
She always patiently answered all my questions, ensuring that I fully understood every aspect of my pregnancy journey. Her willingness to take the time to discuss various options and potential outcomes gave me confidence and peace of mind during this important time in my life.

I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Divya to anyone seeking exceptional prenatal and obstetric care. She is not only a brilliant medical professional but also a caring and compassionate human being. My pregnancy journey was made infinitely better because of her, and I will forever be grateful for her support and expertise. Thank you, Dr. Divya, for helping me bring my precious baby into the world with confidence and care.
